subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Emanuele Sella won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia after breaking away on a steep climb 34 miles from the finish, and Gabriele Bosisio took the overall lead.
snippet: Emanuele Sella won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia after breaking away on a steep climb 34 miles from the finish, and Gabriele Bosisio took the overall lead.
